author: None
comment: oooh!! can i ask what year this is in?

author: mount2010
comment: At the end of year 1 they'll hold a briefing about it. It'll be at the start of year 2. If you get into TPLEAD (tp leadership programme) you will also get opportunities to go overseas as an elective.

author: Why_salty69
comment: Depends on ur course. If u take global studies for y1.2 then youll have the opportunity to go overseas during that period. Otherwise itll be y2.1
